newsitem.title: USA: Digi to make high-speed modems.
newsitem.headline: Digi to make high-speed modems.

text.p: Digi International Inc said Thursday it was awarded a contract to make wireline modems featuring AetherWorks Corp's high-speed modem technology.

Under terms of the deal, Digi could convert secured notes it acquired from AetherWorks into a majority interest in that company, a St. Paul, Minnesota, developer of computer telephony, wireless and dial-up remote access technology.
The technology, called V.Mach, will be unveiled at a technology show next week in Las Vegas, the companies said.
